function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Geographic spread of West Nile virus and Lyme disease","Impact":"Increase in disease spread and risk to the public","Mitigation":"Vector control measures, public health education, and surveillance","Technologies":"Mosquito traps, pesticide spraying, GIS mapping, and remote sensing","People":"Canadian public","Owner":"Public health organizations and government agencies"},{"Description":"Effect of climate change on VBDs","Impact":"Increased risk of disease emergence and re-emergence","Mitigation":"Implementation of climate change adaptation strategies, vector control, and public health interventions","Technologies":"Climate modeling, surveillance systems, and early warning systems","People":"Canadian public","Owner":"Government agencies and environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Urban and suburban planning and VBD risk","Impact":"Modulation of disease risk based on landscape design","Mitigation":"Urban planning regulations, green infrastructure, and public health initiatives","Technologies":"Urban planning software, GIS mapping, and public health campaigns","People":"Residents of urban and suburban areas","Owner":"Local government and urban planning authorities"}]}
